Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
game.logic.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
This class represents the game logic

      public Position geTokenPosition(Scanner scanner)
      This method returns the position of a token. In case the player can't place the token, it returns null
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      position of the new token

    • puTokenToEnv

      public boolean puTokenToEnv(Choice board, Scanner scanner, Display display, DisplayTools grid, Environment env, Tile chosenTile, Token chosenToken, Player player, ArrayList<Token> tokens)
      This method places a token in the environment
      Parameters:
      board - choice board
      scanner - scanner
      display - display
      grid - player's grid
      env - player's environment
      chosenTile - chosen tile
      chosenToken - chosen token
      player - player
      tokens - tokens
      Returns:
      true if the token was placed, false otherwise
